2fa.description: You have configured two factor authentication, please enter the 6 digit code

welcome.title: Welcome to Internxt!
welcome.description: Client-side encrypted, simple, fast, secure and private.
welcome.invitation: Discover the brand new features of Drive Desktop.

sync-folder.title: Sync Folder
sync-folder.description-1: You'll find a new folder where all your data from the Internxt cloud will be accessible.
sync-folder.description-2: Simply drag and drop items into this folder and press the play button to upload them.
sync-folder.description-3: Press the play button to keep this folder synchronized with other devices.
sync-folder.description-4: Choose sync folder location from settings.

widget.title: Internxt Widget
widget.description-2: Update your plan, device name or configure backups from the settings menu.
widget.description-3: View the state of your data transfer.
widget.description-4: Check the status of your sync and backups processes.
widget.description-5: Start or stop your sync process anytime.

no-activity.title: There is no recent activity
no-activity.description: Information will show up here when changes are made to sync your local folder with Internxt Drive

general.auto-startup: Start Internxt Drive on system startup

backups.activate: Back up your folders and files

folders.explanation: Folders you want to add to the next backup

stop-baking-up.title: Stop backing up "
stop-baking-up.explanation: New files added to this folder will no longer backup in your Internxt Drive. Original files will remain on your computer

error-messages.no-internet: Looks like you are not connected to the internet, we'll try again later
error-messages.no-remote-connection: We could not connect to Internxt servers, we'll try again later
error-messages.cannot-get-current-listings: We could not get the status of your current files, we'll try again later
error-messages.base-directory-does-not-exist: Unable to find your sync folder
error-messages.insuficient-permision-accessing-base-dir: Internxt App does not have permission to access your sync folder
error-messages.cannot-access-base-directory: We could not access your local folder
error-messages.cannot-access-tmp-directory: We could not access your  local folder
error-messages.unknown: An unknown error ocurred while trying to sync your files
error-messages.empty-file: We don't support files with a size of 0 bytes because of our processes of sharding and encryption
error-messages.bad-response: We got a bad response from our servers while processing this file. Please, try starting the sync process again.
error-messages.file-does-not-exist: This file was present when we compared your local folder with your Internxt drive but dissapeared when we tried to access it. If you deleted this file, don't worry, this error should dissapear the next time the sync process starts.

report-modal.report: You can also send a report about this error.
report-modal.include-logs: Include the logs of this sync process for debug purposes
